name: Sisters Royal: Five Stars Under Fire - Ode
storyline: Does she too have her sights set on marrying the angel Yashin? Having come to duel with the sisters, she hides her face behind a mask... Armed with immensely mighty magic attacks, she hurtles into the sisters' conflict!
summary: Ode adds an additional character to the game Sisters Royal: Five Stars Under Fire. A mysterious, so-called "Strongest Witch" appears in the five sisters' world, using magic and soaring across the skies. Stories for Ode also added. Further high score rankings also added.
